CHANGES

0.6.0 (2009-02-19)
------------------

- No longer used deprecated z3c.layer.

- Fixed dependencies and tests.

------------------

- Bug: Fixed meta-data.

- Bug: Fixed deprecation warning about the Zope Security Policy.


0.5.0 (2008-01-21)
------------------

- Initial Release
